index.description: A full suite of features to take your communities roleplay to the next level, all in one "Net", FiveNet.
index.headline: Enhance Your Communities' Roleplay

what_is.title: What is FiveNet?
what_is.description: FiveNet is an open source project with several features to enhances your communities roleplay. From searching the state's citizen and vehicles database, filling documents for police investigations, court, and livemap of your colleagues and dispatches. A plugin especially for FiveM servers is available that enalbes the in-game tablet.

copyright: Copyright Â© {year} Galexrt All rights reserved.

hero.title: Need help with FiveNet?
hero.description: Checkout the documentation here to learn about the available features.

citizens.title: Search Citizens
citizens.description: Search and find information about Citizens, including basic info, their licenses and related documents.

vehicles.title: Vehicle Register
vehicles.description: Search and find information about Vehicles.

documents.title: Document Management
documents.description: Search, create and manage Documents, using templates or from scratch.

jobs.title: Jobs
jobs.description: Infos about your job and employee management (e.g., conduct register, timeclock).

calendar.title: Calendar
calendar.description: A calendar for each individual and factions, with a RSVP functionality.

livemap.title: Livemap
livemap.description: Live position of dispatches and your colleagues.

centrum.title: Dispatch Center
centrum.description: Dispatch Center, for dispatching Dispatches to colleagues, managing units and dispatches.

i18n.title: Multi-Language UI
i18n.description: Multiple languages available for the UI.

nuxt3_ui.title: Nuxt 3 + Nuxt UI Pro
nuxt3_ui.description: Powered by Nuxt 3 and Nuxt UI Pro for optimal performance.

open_source.title: Open Source
open_source.description: FiveNet's code is licensed under the Apache 2.0 license.

mailer.title: E-Mails
mailer.description: Write emails to colleagues and citizens for quick communication.

CookieControl.title: We use cookies!
CookieControl.subtitle: The main purpose of our cookies is to have a basic user tracking for analytical purposes.
CookieControl.description: The best way to remove this websites data is to use the clear website data function of your browser.
